title: The 31 best Galentine Day gifts your pals will love | Friendship
body_text:
Galentine’s Day may not be an official holiday (yet), but we’re on board with any opportunity to show your friends some love. For the uninitiated, the concept is simple: 13 February is earmarked as a day to get together with your besties and celebrate your friendship. It’s not so much the antithesis of Valentine’s Day, more a reminder that romantic love is not the only type of love there is.
So, if you’re planning a get together with your closest pals and want to show your appreciation with a gift (or maybe you just want to buy a pick-me-up for yourself), we’ve rounded up 31 fun and thoughtful ideas. Whether it’s a home pottery kit, a boxercise set, cosy slippers or a bundle for pickle lovers, our suggestions will help you find something to empower, treat and celebrate them.
The best Galentine’s Day gifts for 2026
Note to self
Papier wellness journal
When life gets hectic, self-care can fall to the bottom of the priority list. This journal is filled with prompts to help them track and set wellness goals, and will encourage them to check in with themselves.
Tray cool
Lékué heart ice cube tray
This heart-shaped ice tray is cute and useful – and will make them smile every time they make an iced coffee at home.
Hot to pot
Home pottery kit
This beginner-friendly pottery kit comes with clay, tools, paints and everything you need to create ceramics at home. Perfect for a friends’ night or a gift to encourage their creativity.
Get shirty, in a good way
Mystery female football player shirt
One for the football fanatics. Each box contains a shirt with a female star player’s name on the back, randomly selected from a club or nation from around the world.
Moments of reflection
Calligraphy engraved compact mirror
This engraved compact mirror is useful, personal and a little bit luxe. The perfect pop-in-a-handbag size, and a more grownup alternative to using their phone as a mirror.
Caffeine and cartoons
Peanuts x Grind cafetière
This Snoopy cafetière from a Peanuts collaboration with Grind is joyful. The colour pops are pure Memphis Design, and the sight of Snoopy snorkelling in the coffee will inject some fun into their morning. The enamel mugs are a delight, too.
For more, read our guide to the best cafetières, tested
Prints? Charming
Blue mother of pearl photo frame
A beautiful frame containing a photo of a fond memory is always a fail-safe gift. Oliver Bonas does beautiful dopamine-decor frames – this checked blue and mother of pearl one is particularly pretty.
A friend indeed
Bad Friend: A Century of Revolutionary Friendships
Giving your bestie a book called Bad Friend may seem like a not-so-thinly veiled insult at first glance, but this nonfiction book by cultural historian Tiffany Watt Smith explores the concept of female friendship through history, with interviews and memoir.
Jim-jam joy
Pink and red striped poplin pyjama bottoms
These adorable striped pyjama bottoms in quintessential Valentine’s Day colours will have them wanting a cosy night in with a romcom.
For more, read our guide to the best women’s pyjamas
Style statement
Brass crescent and black disc earrings
Buying jewellery for a friend can be tricky – even when you think you know their style, it’s easy to get it wrong. So keep it classic and simple – these black and brass earrings fit the bill perfectly.
A touch of cloth
Set of four cocktail napkins
Linen cocktail napkins will save on paper waste and make a lovely gift – these food-and-drink-themed ones are quirky and cute. We love the pasta shapes.
Can buy me glove
Everlast boxercise kit
A new hobby and way to release pent-up anger? Sign us up. This boxing set comes with pads and gloves so you can spar together – keeping fit and letting off steam at the same time.
Love for their lips
Gisou honey-infused lip oil
A lovely lip oil that feels nourishing like a balm, but gives shine and colour like a gloss. The perfect little pick-me-up for the friend who doesn’t leave the house without a lip treatment.
For more, read our guide to the best lip balms
Hair-raising gift
Metal french hair pin
French hair pins make it easy to achieve a chic up-do, even if you’re useless at home styling. This simple silver metal one will go with every outfit. There are tons of tutorials online that make it easy to perfect a sleek and sophisticated twist.
I should cocoa
Knoops hot chocolate flakes
Cold February days call for a delicious and soothing cup of hot chocolate. Knoops chocolate flakes come in various cocoa percentages, so you can tailor it to your friend’s taste. Melt them straight into hot milk for an indulgent treat.
Beautiful brownies, boxed
Cake or Death ultimate bakery selection
Cake or death – that’s a pretty easy question. These indulgent, letterbox brownies are handmade in Devon and posted everywhere; we sampled the ultimate bakery selection, which are fudgy and gooey but crunchy in the right places. The pink leopard-print packaging is a treat, too.
Once a bottle, now a bag
Recycled laptop sleeve
Female-owned brand Kind Bag makes brightly coloured bags and accessories using recycled plastic bottles. This laptop sleeve comes in various jazzy patterns that will provide an instant hit of dopamine.
Keep charm and carry on
Espresso martini beaded bag charm
Bag charms can add sparkle to an otherwise plain handbag. Anthropologie has lots of quirky options. We love this espresso martini design, equal parts classy and fun.
Happy hands
L’Occitane shea butter hand cream, 150ml
This L’Occitane shea butter hand cream is a “handbag essential”, according to our beauty writer Sarah Matthews, who rated it the overall winner in her test of the best hand creams. Made with a moisturising mix of shea butter, argan and coconut oil, it’s “beautifully soothing, softening and protective without feeling greasy”.
Treat for their feet
Calzedonia crossover pilates socks
These crossover pilates socks feel much more elegant than your standard grip socks. They come in black, khaki or grey leopard print and will have them rushing to book their next class.
Frills to beat the chills
Red gingham hot-water bottle
This red gingham hot-water bottle with a frill edge is completely charming: a cosy bed companion that won’t hog the duvet.
For more, read our guide to the best hot-water bottles
Living la Frida loca
Frida Kahlo cross-stitch kit
Analogue activities like cross stitch are the key to reducing screen time, and their repetitive nature promotes mindfulness. This kit is beginner-friendly, and each stitch builds to reveal a picture of feminist icon Frida Kahlo.
Love triangle
Navy triangle scarf
This triangle scarf is a subtle and chic way to spice up their outfit, while protecting their neck from the cold. The navy with the pop of electric blue feels statement but so wearable.
For more, read our guide to how to dress stylishly in cold weather
Words of inspiration
Feminist History for Every Day of the Year
Kate Mosse’s book is filled with daily doses of inspiring stories, quotes, poems and pictures, all focusing on amazing women throughout history – from Malala Yousafzai to Billie Eilish.
Whole choc a love
Charbonnel et Walker red velvet heart chocolate truffles
“Heart-shaped boxes of chocolates, like classic 90s romcoms, are good cheesy. This is the love token of champions,” says Jess Cartner-Morley. This one comes filled with milk and dark chocolate truffles that are almost too pretty to eat.
For more, check out Jess Cartner-Morley’s February style essentials
Say it with bubbles
Neom de-stress bath foam, 200ml
You can’t beat a nice bubble bath. This foam from female-founded brand Neom has a relaxing lavender, jasmine and Brazilian rosewood scent that will help them decompress, while marshmallow, aloe leaf, coconut and sweet almond oils will leave their skin supple and soft.
Lights to lift the gloom
Mini mindful moments candle set
Filled with honey-scented candles with a 20-minute burn time, this set encourages the recipient to light a candle and take a moment out of their day to practise mindfulness.
For more, read our guide to the best scented candles
Art works
Paint and sip kit, margarita
This bundle comes with two premixed cocktails and a cocktail-inspired print with paints and a brush – everything needed for an evening of painting and sipping at home. You can choose from espresso martini, margarita and passion fruit martini.
Keeping toes toasty
Yoko wool slippers
A treat for the feet: these cosy slippers have a wool lining to keep toes extra toasty.
For more, read our guide to the best slippers
Stylish storage for essentials
Striped ruffle pouch
This striped pouch with frill trim is adorable, and it solves a problem – it keeps all your essentials together so they don’t get lost inside your bag.
Preserve your friendship
The pickle lover bundle
This lovely tomato-logo tote comes stuffed with three packs of pickles, three packs of pickle-flavoured crisps, and (perhaps more surprisingly) three bottles of pickle juice, ideal for mixing into dirty martinis … or just sipping straight. Cheers!
